ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT: Recommendation for a home firewall
ygData.msgSnippet: i myself use Blackice firewall. I ve got no complaints, except that when you unban some ip s they automatically go to your trusted ip list, which is silly. I
ygData.messageBody:
i myself use Blackice firewall. I've got no complaints, except that when you
unban some ip's they automatically go to your trusted ip list, which is
silly. I know a friend of mine uses the one that comes with win2000, but i
dont want to install 2000 on my pc, its running smooth and im not
reinstalling/giving myself a headache for nothing

Minkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Sent: October 6, 2000 11:08 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] OT: Recommendation for a home firewall


I was wondering if any of you out there are using firewall software in
conjunction with EQ. I currently use Microsoft Internet Connection sharing
on my home network, but havent installed any firewall software at all, and I
am a bit nervous about that.

Any recommendations? I am currently looking at WinRoute Pro as a solution.

Lago Bardoon


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
